## Part 1

Using the filters on https://m.imdb.com/search, Turkish movies with
more than 2500 reviews are saved in the URLs.

```{r, message=FALSE, results='asis'}
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
first <- "https://m.imdb.com/search/title/?title_type=feature&release_date=,2009-12-31&num_votes=2500,&country_of_origin=TR"
second <- "https://m.imdb.com/search/title/?title_type=feature&release_date=2010-01-01,2023-12-31&num_votes=2500,&country_of_origin=TR"

url <- c(first,second)
```
